name: Slop Ball Run
description:
Ready for some relaxing 3D roll the ball fun?

Ball Rolling 3D takes you on a never-ending quest with the rolling ball on a hop road between gigantic skyscrapers. Balance the 3D ball and avoid obstacles that appear unexpectedly on the road. Immerse yourself in stunning geometric city-inspired environments, and relax your mind while having fun.

◉ BALL ROLLING QUEST – ROLL, FLY, HOP ON THE CRAZY ROAD
The rolling run ball is released. Your job? To keep the going ball within the twisty roads while avoiding collisions with the numerous objects that will appear on the road. As you roll the ball on the fun ball run road, you can also collect diamonds that can later be used for purchases.

◉ HOW LONG CAN YOU GO?
Just keeping the roller ball on the road may sound easy. Well, maybe at the beginning it’s easy. But as you roll and jump in the sky, the road and rooftops can get tiny, and numerous obstructive objects can occupy the road. This is when you need to show your skills and reflexes. The goal of the game is to achieve and break your high scores. Can you become one of the 1% players club that scored more than 1000 points?

◉ BALL ROLLING 3D GAME FEATURES:
- simple 3D roll the ball challenge
- geometric graphics in a 3D city environment
- relaxing soundtrack
- easy controls
- continue from the spot where you lost the game

One of the most exciting 3D ball games of 2023 is awaiting you.
► Download this rolling ball game and embark on the crazy journey of the sky ball on the skyscraper dancing roads.
